title: Page Hero

fields.label: Hero Title
fields.name: hero_title
fields.instructions: Main hero title. Required for hero to display.

fields.label: Hero Title Line Two
fields.name: hero_title_line_two
fields.instructions: Optional second line for the title (displayed on a new line).

fields.label: Hero Subtitle
fields.name: hero_subtitle
fields.instructions: Optional subtitle displayed below the title.

fields.label: Hero Text
fields.name: hero_text
fields.instructions: Hero description text. Use line breaks to create multiple paragraphs.

fields.label: Button Text
fields.name: hero_button_text
fields.instructions: Optional button text (e.g., 'Find a Career', 'Schedule Demo').

fields.label: Button Link
fields.name: hero_button_link
fields.instructions: Button link URL. Required if button text is provided.

fields.label: Full Height
fields.name: hero_full_height
fields.instructions: Make the hero section full viewport height with centered content.

fields.label: Hero Variation
fields.name: hero_variation
fields.instructions: Choose a style variation for the hero section.

description: Hero section fields for pages. Configure the hero title, subtitle, text, button, and styling options.
